title: Wear Lightning
description: Designed for Android Wear but also works on other devices.Couldn't be easier! Instructions:    1. Start app    2. Tap screen when you see a lightning    3. Tap again when you hear the thunderFor a more immersive experience, after tapping the screen once, the calculation is shown in real time. After tapping the screen the second time a highly accurate distance is displayed.  Designed to be as simple and lightweight as possible.
descriptionHTML:
Designed for Android Wear but also works on other devices.

Couldn't be easier! Instructions:
1. Start app
2. Tap screen when you see a lightning
3. Tap again when you hear the thunder

For a more immersive experience, after tapping the screen once, the calculation is shown in real time. After tapping the screen the second time a highly accurate distance is displayed.

Designed to be as simple and lightweight as possible.
